special_text:
[i]Vigor – [/i]At the beginning of your end step, if your life total has changed this turn, Devika phases out.
[+1]: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. [i](It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
[-2]: Put three -1/-1 counters on target creature. You lose 3 life.
